name: YankeeTek Ventures
tag_list: business-support-services, business-development-consultancy-or-services, business-planning-financial-services, infrastructure-services, management-consultancy, product-development, venture-capital, business-funding-consultancy
overview: YankeeTek Ventures founded in early 2000, is a venture capital fund for early-stage technology companies. YankeeTek helps entrepreneurs launch their start-ups by providing comprehensive resources, strategic advice, and an extensive network of business relationships to rapidly grow their ideas into strong, successful companies. Fund investors include 3Com, Compaq, Nortel Networks, Novell and The Yankee Group. Several venture capital funds are also invested in YankeeTek, including Advanced Technology Ventures, Advent International, Bain Capital, Battery Ventures, Boston Millennia Partners, HarbourVest Partners, and TH Lee Putnam Ventures.

funding_round.source_description: RedShift Secures $12 Million in First-Round Financing
